website_summaries.verdict: A very good quality set of plush animal hand puppets with more stuffing than other puppets.
pros: Comes in a couple of different animal combinations
cons: Some of these puppets do not have moving mouths
If you want moving mouths, carefully check the set you order

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my online ESL Instruction. They arrived quickly. I wasn't certain of the movable mouth of the sheep and rightly so. The sheep does not have a movable mouth, but the cow does. I don't remember reading that in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Thirteen Hens

customer_reviews.title: Could be bigger
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a puppet that i could use for my son and came upon these. These are nice but I wish they would fit my hand better. My pinky and ring finger fit in one arm and in the other is my thumb. Middle finger and index finger are inside the head trying to make the mouth move. I wanted something where you could manipulate the mouth more but this is ok.
customer_reviews.author: LadyLola

customer_reviews.title: Puppets for generations to come.
customer_reviews.text: Quality puppets with fabric that will hold up. They are sized for both children or adults to use for hours of fun. Looked at many puppets. These are keepers for a long time to come. Bought 6 different animals from this brand and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Barely real puppets
customer_reviews.text: The cow puppet you can barely get your hand in to move the mouth. The other puppet has no mouth at all. Fingers do not fit well into the hands either.
customer_reviews.author: Lynmc

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little puppets!
customer_reviews.text: These puppets are darling. I found that I needed to "work" the arms inside and get them ready for my grandsons' little hands - but other than that, they are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy O

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my hands
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and would get 5 stars but they had to go back. They were small on my hands and the sheep doesn’t have a puppet mouth to work
customer_reviews.author: OneUniverse

customer_reviews.title: Sheep's mouth can't open
customer_reviews.text: Fyi.... Only the cow can move its mouth. Not fun for a 4 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Jusa

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great little products, softness is great very giftable
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great puppets!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these!!! I thought they might be too big for my 1 year old but she is obsessed!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed because I was led to believe both the hand puppets had moveable mouths. However, only the cow had a moveable mouth, the sheep did not. Very disappointed because I required both of them to be. Other than that they were very nice.
customer_reviews.author: P.Brumfield

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that these were better quality an most importantly that the hand went in to move the mouths, sadly these don't work like that
customer_reviews.author: Jamisha

customer_reviews.title: High quality and so soft
customer_reviews.text: They are so soft and cute. They are made really well. I am very happy with the product and will definitely order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: BN

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, so glad I purchased them
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, so glad I purchased them. Not all puppets are a good size, or allow. you to open and close their mouths.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Cute, small,Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Both puppets will fit smaller hands. Sheep is cute but the cow has most of its seems opening and I have had to do many repairs. Attempted to contact the company, but had a very difficult time doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: For the price, I wasn't expecting a lot, ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I wasn't expecting a lot, but I was pleasantly surprised by the quality. Very cute puppets with movable mouths.
customer_reviews.author: K. Banik

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable puppets and the sheep looks like Sean the sheep from TV.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Pope

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: They are not real built for a hand to go into, only partially able to get a hand in, especially into the head. I have to hold it with 2 fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Well made and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I used the puppets to teach small children and they loved them. They are well made and very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and awesome product. We have great family fun playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Swan

customer_reviews.title: The puppets are good quality. pretty easy to get an adult hand ...
customer_reviews.text: The puppets are good quality. pretty easy to get an adult hand in to use. I am sure my Grandaughter will love them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: So glad we ordered them
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves the puppets. So glad we ordered them!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The lamb fingers are kinda of small The pink one was great
customer_reviews.author: jeanne

customer_reviews.title: We love our puppets
customer_reviews.text: We love our puppets! There are being used by preschool - 2nd grade children for our church Christmas program! Thank You for providing us quality products quickly. Cara Riessland
customer_reviews.author: Cara Riessland

customer_reviews.title: These puppets are lovely. Well made and the fit ...
customer_reviews.text: These puppets are lovely. Well made and the fit both adult and children’s hands. I would purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Puppets were delivered promptly and are adorable! I look forward to many hours of fun with my nephew!
customer_reviews.author: Amy M Dion

product_meta.title: BETTERLINE Animal Hand Puppets Set of 2 Premium Quality, 9.5 Inches Soft Plush Hand Puppets for Kids- Perfect for Storytelling, Teaching, Preschool, Role-Play Toy Puppets (Cow and Sheep)
feature_bullets: 🐮 TOP QUALITY MANUFACTURE: hard to take away from your kid’s hands! Soft and huggable, in the ideal 14” size to be easily handled by little hands, they are easy to clean and store and guaranteed to offer little adventurers long creative hours.

🐑 AUTHENTIC LINE DESIGN: soft, huggable, cuddly buddies. Perfect for creative hours of play at home, in the kindergarten, daycare or the party, they are ideal for puppet theatre, storytelling, pretend play or role-play, as they cultivate kid’s imagination!

🐮 BEST TRAVEL FRIENDLY PUPPETS: holidays, sleepover or weekend trip, Better Line animal hand puppets will take just minimum space in their backpack, schoolbag or duffel, offering entertainment on the go and saving them the boredom of a long trip!

🐑 GREAT GIFT TO GIVE TO LITTLE ANGELS: Soft, cuddly and in 7 different animal pair combinations, our plush hand puppets set only makes it difficult to choose ONE! Offer one set to your kids, grandchildren or preschool pupils as an impulse gift or on any occasion! Help them make their own collection and enjoy their ear-to-ear smile!

🐮 NO QUESTIONS 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: and craftsmanship of our Animal Hand Puppets Set and we are sure your kids will LOVE them! This is why we are backing them with 90-Day no questions money-back guarantee, to help you buy with confidence!
